column1: Topic title: Schoolboy  15  killed in m cycle accident on LDP

column8: text

PETALING JAYA: A 15-year-old schoolboy was killed in an accident on the Damansara Puchong Expressway (LDP) near the Bukit Puchong overhead bridge here.The boy has been identified as Mohamad Shahrizal Adha Shaharun from Subang Jaya.Selangor traffic police chief Supt Kamaludin Mohamad said the incident occurred at Km28 of the highway at about 1.35pm Wednesday.He said the boy is believed to have lost control of his motorcycle, hit the road curb and was flung back onto the road.The boy suffered serious injuries to his head and was pronounced dead by medical personnel from Serdang Hospital.http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...ccident-on-ldp/
